product_name: TYR Tracer Racing Metallized Swim Goggles
long_description: The TYR Tracer Racing metallized swim goggles bring your training goals into focus with startling clarity. Thermoplastic rubber gaskets and a multiple nosepiece system personalize the fit (includes 5 nosepieces). Antifog, optical-grade polycarbonate lenses allow excellent peripheral vision. Metallized finish provides added antiglare- and UV-protection. Double silicone headstrap features a top-slotted clip to prevent strap slippage and allow easy adjustment. Recommended for racing and elite training.
short_description: The TYR Tracer Racing metallized swim goggles bring your training goals into focus with startling clarity.
